title: Set up Desired Capabilities for WebUI Testing in Katalon Studio
description: Katalon Studio allows you to define desired capabilities for   local execution with Chrome, Firefox, Internet Explorer (IE),   Safari, Edge or Edge (Chromium) in Project > Settings     > Desired Capabilities > WebUI >     Chrome/Firefox/IE/Safari/Edge/Edge(Chromium).

frontMatter.title: Set up Desired Capabilities for WebUI Testing in Katalon Studio
